title: Buff Discord Music Bot
description: Developed a feature-rich Discord music bot with advanced playback controls, including play, pause, resume, skip, queue, and loop functionalities. Integrated support for YouTube and Spotify, enabling users to stream music seamlessly.

title: Microsoft Rewards Automation
description: Created a Python-based automation script to streamline daily Microsoft Rewards tasks. The script leverages Selenium for web automation, saving time and effort for users.

title: RP Server Development
description: Designed and developed a comprehensive Roleplay (RP) server for GTA V, featuring jobs, housing, vehicles, and other immersive gameplay elements. Built with a focus on scalability and user engagement.

title: Calendar Event Manager
description: Developed a user-friendly application to manage Google Calendar events, featuring secure integration and an intuitive interface.

title: WEB-based Multiplayer Game
description: Developed a multiplayer web-based game during an HCL internship. The project involved creating a real-time gaming experience using modern web technologies and networking concepts.

title: Multiplayer Turtle Game
description: Built a multiplayer game using Python's Turtle graphics library, allowing multiple players to interact on a single system. The project showcased creativity and problem-solving in game development.

title: Medicine Reminder
description: Developed a Windows application to help users manage their medication schedules. The app allows users to add medicines and set reminders, ensuring timely intake.
